Welcome to datapool's documentation!
====================================

If you want to work with data stored in the datapool, read the
data user instruction. If you want to load measurements data in
the data pool, read the data provider instructions.

Content:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   instruction_data_user
   for_data_providers/index
   installation
   database_layout
   command_line
   how_to_work_on_documentation

   obsolete



The datapool source code can be found `here <https://129.132.202.168/uweschmitt/eawag_datapool/tree/master>`_.
